title: What is Google's vision for Google+? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion, the most important vision is to have monopoly over the internet by becoming the largest social network site so than Google can be the leader in Social Website also like it's search engine and other services. Google wants to be the one and only provider for all the services available on the internet and also with this vision its coming to the hardware and several other fields. For example the Chromebook, Chromecast and lots more...
